title: Create or update a TTO Creator Marketplace campaign

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by a TTO Creator Marketplace account. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

parameters.name: campaign_type
parameters.description: The type of the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign. Enum value: CAMPAIGN : A campaign with a campaign-level invite link . Default value: CAMPAIGN .

parameters.name: brand_profile_id Conditional
parameters.description: Either brand_profile_id or brand_name is required. The ID of a Brand Profile within the TTO Creator Marketplace account to associate with the campaign. To create a Brand Profile and obtain the Brand Profile ID, use /tto/tcm/brand/profile/create/ . To retrieve existing Brand Profile IDs, use /tto/tcm/brand/profile/get/ .

parameters.name: brand_name Conditional
parameters.description: Either brand_profile_id or brand_name is required. Brand name. Length limit: 60 characters. Note : If you are updating an existing campaign (with campaign_id specified in the request), the current campaign brand_name value will be used regardless of the value you pass in.

parameters.name: campaign_name
parameters.description: Campaign name. Your campaign name should be informative and stand out to creators. You can follow the format [product name - product description] to tell creators about the basics of your brand or product. Length limit: 120 characters. Example: CapCut - video editor Note : If you are updating an existing campaign (with campaign_id specified in the request), the current campaign campaign_name value will be used regardless of the value you pass in.

parameters.name: campaign_description
parameters.description: Campaign description. Provide relevant information about your campaign, such as your product's positioning, target audiences, and core features. Length limit: 1,000 characters. Note : If you are updating an existing campaign (with campaign_id specified in the request), the current campaign campaign_description value will be used regardless of the value you pass in.

parameters.name: anchor_id
parameters.description: ID of the anchor to associate with the campaign. Anchors are links you add to your post that help viewers learn more about your product or service. The anchor is only visible to audiences in the anchor’s target country. Performance data of the anchor can only be measured when the creator's country matches the anchor’s target country. The video is still visible to the creator's audience, but the anchor attached is only visible to audiences in the anchor's country. To obtain the anchors within your TTO Creator Marketplace account, use /tto/tcm/anchor/get/ .

parameters.name: advertiser_ids
parameters.description: A list of ad accounts to associate the campaign with. When a creator's video is linked to the campaign, these ad accounts will automatically be granted Spark Ads authorization for the video and the video will be automatically synced to the creative library of these ad accounts. When you specify advertiser_ids , default_spark_ads_requested_authorization_days is required. Max size: 50. To obtain the IDs of the ad accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /oauth2/advertiser/get/ .

parameters.name: default_spark_ads_requested_authorization_days Conditional
parameters.description: Valid when you are creating a new campaign. Required when advertiser_ids is specified. Optional when advertiser_ids is not specified. Ignored when you are updating an existing campaign. The default number of authorization days you want to request from the creator to boost all of the videos uploaded for the campaign as Spark Ads. Value range: 0-365. Default value: 0. Once this field is set to a value other than the value 0, when a creator accepts the invitation and uploads videos to the campaign, the creator automatically grants you Spark Ads authorization for the videos for the specified number of days.

parameters.name: handle_names
parameters.description: The handle name list of TikTok creators that you want to invite to the campaign. Max size: 100. For new campaigns, specify the handle names of TikTok Creators to invite. For existing campaigns, specify additional handle names to invite. The new Creators will be added to the existing list. For example, if you created a campaign with handle_names as ["{{handle_name_1}}","{{handle_name_2}}"] and want to invite two more creators, you can pass campaign_id and set handle_names to ["{{handle_name_3}}","{{handle_name_4}}"] . The handle_names value of the updated campaign will be ["{{handle_name_1}}","{{handle_name_2}}","{{handle_name_3}}","{{handle_name_4}}"] .

parameters.name: send_notification
parameters.description: Whether to send a notification regarding the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign invitation to the inboxes of invited TikTok creators ( handle_names ). The creators can open the notification to join the campaign. Supported values: true , false . Default value: false .

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: Valid when you are updating an existing campaign. If this field is passed, all the other fields except tto_tcm_account_id and handle_names will be ignored. The ID of an existing TTO Creator Marketplace campaign. When you pass this field, you need to pass handle_names simultaneously to add new Creators to an existing campaign.

parameters.name: business_account_handle
parameters.description: The handle (username) of the Business Account. When you include this parameter during campaign creation, the creator will have the option to message the brand directly when they open the generated invite link (invite_link). Only applicable when the handle is a non-EU Business Account. Note : Associating a Business Account with a TTO Creator Marketplace Campaign during campaign creation is currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative.

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

parameters.name: campaign_type
parameters.description: The type of the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign. Enum value: BRAND_LINK : A campaign with a brand-level invite link .

parameters.name: brand_profile_id
parameters.description: The ID of a Brand Profile within the TTO Creator Marketplace account to associate with the campaign. To create a Brand Profile and obtain the Brand Profile ID, use /tto/tcm/brand/profile/create/ . To retrieve existing Brand Profile IDs, use /tto/tcm/brand/profile/get/ .

parameters.name: advertiser_ids
parameters.description: A list of ad accounts to associate the campaign with. When a creator's video is linked to the campaign, these ad accounts will automatically be granted Spark Ads authorization for the video. You can specify ad accounts that share the same business center, legal entity, or logged in email. When you specify advertiser_ids , default_spark_ads_requested_authorization_days is required. Max size: 50. To obtain the IDs of the ad accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /oauth2/advertiser/get/ .

parameters.name: default_spark_ads_requested_authorization_days Conditional
parameters.description: Valid when you are creating a new campaign. Required when advertiser_ids is specified. Optional when advertiser_ids is not specified. Ignored when you are updating an existing campaign. The default number of authorization days you want to request from the creator to boost all of the videos uploaded for the campaign as Spark Ads. Value range: 0-365. Default value: 0. Once this field is set to a value other than the value 0, when a creator accepts the invitation and uploads videos to the campaign, the creator automatically grants you Spark Ads authorization for the videos for the specified number of days.

parameters.name: business_account_handle
parameters.description: The handle (username) of the Business Account. When you include this parameter during campaign creation, the creator will have the option to message the brand directly when they open the generated invite link (invite_link). Only applicable when the handle is a non-EU Business Account. Note : Associating a Business Account with a TTO Creator Marketplace Campaign during campaign creation is currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative.
